name: Palallel
description:
Discover a brand-new cooperative experience with Palallel, a 2D puzzle platformer for two players !

Trapped in themed boards, find your way through the puzzles and get to the exit. But don’t forget your partner !

Each player has his own level that only he can see. Players must find a way to unlock and get to their exit door.

To achieve this, you must cooperate by exchanging objects and trigger mechanisms that can affect both your side and your partner’s.

You'll need to communicate efficiently with your friend to beat all levels...



Palallel has one specificity: You won’t be able to see or interact with your friend

Communication is key to progress in parallel with your partner… Will you be able to solve puzzles while cooperating effectively ?



To exchange an object, it’s simple: get it out of your board...



… and it will pop on the other, on the opposite side !



Interact with buttons, switches, pressure plates and more to open the path to your friend.





You like physic-based games ? So do we !

Throw balls & keys, use crates as a platform, play with gravity, …

Even in these boards, laws of physics still exist !.. Most of the time... Approximately…





When you reach the limit of a world, you'll encounter an "END" level, aka trial levels.

These levels are a bit different in the layout (not a single screen) and will be quite challenging.





Customize your character as you want with multiple character parts to switch from.

Try out the randomize button to get impressive results real fast.

You can't see your partner but who said you couldn't be pretty to solve puzzle ?





  • 144 Levels individual levels (among these : 8 trials levels, 8 logic rooms and 32 bonus challenges)
  • 36 Achievements to unlock !
  • 10 Themed environments
  • Several mechanics and interactive objects to challenge your brain and dexterity
  • Some easter eggs…
  • Character customization pushed to the limit
